column2: While my predecessor ruled the Anglo-Saxons as Bretwalda, the title was not formalized enough to pass to his successor. It is therefore forfeit!
Then I shall have to assert my own dominance!

The [From.GetTitle] of England, claimant and self-proclaimed rightful ruler of France, has boldly declared [From.GetPossPronoun] rightful place by adopting French Heraldry into [From.GetPossPronoun] banner. This bodes poorly for the future of relations between the two kingdoms, and only time will tell who will rule France.

[From.GetPossPronoun] old claims lost, and with no ambition to ever return to France, the [From.GetRulerTitle] of England has readopted the banner of old, once again proudly displaying the three lions as the only part of the English banner. No longer shall the King of England display ancient French Heraldry in [From.GetPossPronoun] own banner.
The [From.GetTitle] of England has received officiation of his heritage, which [From.GetSheHe] claims to prove [From.GetPossPronoun] right to the Kingdom of France.
There is only one [Root.GetTitle] of France!
